abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project consists of the
            construction of tobacco curing barns by growers; the
            construction of baling centers, tobacco stores and office
            facilities, and the establishment of fuel-wood plantations
            by the regional Unions of Cooperative Tobacco Societies and
            by their constituent primary societies; the construction and
            equipment of additional storage facilities by the Produce
            Marketing Board; the provision of a revolving fund to
            finance, through the Cooperative Unions, seasonal production
            inputs required by new growers; and the retention of
            consultants by the government to prepare possible further
            agricultural projects.
